title: 01/18/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 01/18/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps the weekend that was in the NFL Playoffs. Does he think this is truly the last time we'll see Drew Brees on an NFL field? Troy Aikman zooms in to join in on the conversation. What advice would he give Drew Brees going forward? ESPN's Louis Riddick also calls in to express his frustration with another hiring cycle seemingly coming to an end without Eric Bieniemy landing a head coaching gig.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
